description: Select nice ripe red tomatoes. The ones still on the vine are ideal.
name: Creamy Tomato Mascarpone Pasta Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Add the pasta to the sauce in the pan. Mix to coat all the pasta. Remove from heat and serve.
